content: मोहन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [मुह्-णिच्-ल्यु ल्युट् वा] {@--1@} Stupefying. {@--2@} Bewildering, perplexing, puzzling. {@--3@} Deluding, infatuating. {@--4@} Fascinating, enrapturing; <ls>U. 1. 36</ls>; <ls>Māl. 6. 8.</ls> --नः {@--1@} An epithet of Śiva. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the five arrows of Cupid. {@--3@} The thorn-apple (धत्तूर). --नं {@--1@} Stupefying. {@--2@} Bewildering, perplexing, puzzling. {@--3@} Stupor; loss of sensation. {@--4@} Infatuation, delusion, mistake. {@--5@} A seduction, temptation. {@--6@} Sexual intercourse; <ls>Māl. 4.</ls> {@--7@} A means employed in perplexing others. {@--8@} A magical charm employed to bewilder an enemy.
